snippet.title: The Black Heart (PC) - Intro / Opening
snippet.description:
Intro / Opening of The Black Heart (PC).
The game is available for purchase on Steam.
#theblackheart #ikemen #indie

There is another world apart from ours. 
A world ruined by war and hate.
A blood stained world.
Humanity's destiny was never bound to it, but that is about to change.
The king and creator of the other world has been killed.
His strength and will had disappeared, leaving him old and defenseless. 
However, the incredible power that allowed him to create that other world still throbbed inside him.
He was attacked by Final, a powerful creature from the Chaos that exists between both worlds.
The monster killed the king ripping out his heart and escaped with it back to the depths of the Chaos.
It is said that whoever succeeds in freeing the power within the heart will gain an extraordinary strength.
A power that could end all that exists if it falls into the wrong hands.

THE BLACK HEART

Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_YL558gxlL_ykkORnLODdW_qqKdwDNKq

SEJA MEMBRO DO CANAL:
https://www.youtube.com/lcfreezer/join

The Black Heart (10 Years Edition)
Platform: PC
Genre: Fighting
Developer: Andrés Borghi (https://www.youtube.com/user/guadalajaraman)
Publisher: Saibot Studios
